Greatings members vpsB!

We are VenexCloud LTD , a hosting company that aims to provide highly reliable services at affordable rates. Our servers are located in Limestonenetworks DC and powered by powerful server hardware with 100% uptime guaranteed and free basic DDoS Protection for more information about the DDoS protection (https://www.limestonenetworks.com/data-center/ddos-protection.html)

 

Features:
RAID10 Protected SATA Storage.

4x7x365 support and 100% uptime guaranteed.
Fast and dependable premium network.
Quickly scale capacity, both up and down, as your computing requirements change.

Instant Deployment.

Free Basic DDoS Protection.

Enterprise DDoS Protection for affordable price.
Fedora, CentOS, Debian, FreeBSD, Ubuntu and even your own iso [KVM plans]
